landing.description: Create anonymous feedback groups or join existing ones to share thoughts safely

createGroup.companyPlaceholder: Enter your company or team name
createGroup.shareInfo: Share the Group Code or QR Code with your team members

joinGroup.title: Join Anonymous Feedback Group
joinGroup.privacy: Your feedback will be completely anonymous. Only the group creator can see messages.

messageForm.messagePlaceholder: Share your thoughts, concerns, or suggestions...

adminDashboard.title: Admin Dashboard
adminDashboard.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this message?

qrScanner.title: Scan QR Code
qrScanner.instruction: Point your camera at the QR code
qrScanner.error: Camera access denied or not available

common.anonymousDesc: No tracking, no identification. Your identity stays private.
common.secureDesc: End-to-end security ensures your messages are protected.
common.communicationDesc: Say what needs to be said without fear of retaliation.
